summary.para: Retrieves an object that represents the <Identity> element under the root <Bundle> element.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: Call the method when you have finished using the packageId object.

summary.para: Retrieves an enumerator over all the <Package> elements under the <Packages> element.

param.name: packageInfoItems
param.para: An enumerator over all payload packages in a <Packages> element of a bundle.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the raw XML document without any preprocessing.

param.name: manifestStream
param.para: The read-only stream that represents the XML content of the manifest.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: The raw XML stream is the entire source stream and might contain elements and attributes in other namespaces that are ignored by the manifest reader. For example, the XML stream might have elements in other namespaces that were marked in the IgnorableNamespaces attribute in the Package element, which were not validated. So, we recommend not to trust or parse this XML without security testing.

summary.para: Provides a read-only object model for manifests of bundle packages.
